description: Construction of timber framed rear conservatory on retained existing brick plinth (following demolition of existing conservatory); and associated internal and external alterations
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): PL-001 Rev.A (location plan), PL-002 Rev.A (site plan), PL-010 Rev.A (existing ground floor plan), PL-020 Rev.A (existing elevations), PL-030 Rev.A (existing section A-A), PL-100 Rev.A (proposed ground floor plan), PL-200 Rev.A (proposed elevations), PL-300 Rev.A (proposed section A-A). PL-400 Rev.A (extension), PL-600 Rev.A (glazing details), Design and Access Statement v1.0.2 prepared by Saqqra, Heritage Statement dated 14 September 2023 prepared by Sarah Earney.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
